      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Map.look(UI.direction dir, int distance)
      This method allows the player to look in a certain direction to check whether or not there are enemies in the direction that the player looks.
      Map.moveResult Map.movePlayer(UI.direction dir)
      This method attempts to move the player in the direction specified by the player.
      boolean Map.shoot(UI.direction dir)
      This method will "fire" a bullet from the player's position, and remove the first enemy it encounters from the map.
